Package com.platform.shared.security

package com.platform.shared.security
  • Class
    Description
    CustomOAuth2UserService
    Custom OAuth2 user service for processing OAuth2 user information.
    InputSanitizer
    Comprehensive input sanitization utility for preventing XSS, injection attacks, and ensuring data integrity across the payment platform.
    InputValidationFilter
    Input validation filter that sanitizes all incoming request parameters, headers, and request body to prevent injection attacks and XSS.
    OAuth2AuthenticationSuccessHandler
    Custom OAuth2 authentication success handler.
    OAuth2SecurityConfig
    OAuth2 Security Configuration with PKCE support and secure session management.
    PasswordProperties
    Configuration properties for password authentication policies.
    PasswordProperties.Lockout
     
    PasswordProperties.Policy
     
    PlatformUserPrincipal
    Custom user principal for the platform with tenant context.
    RateLimitConfig
    Rate limiting configuration for different endpoint types.
    RateLimitingFilter
    Rate limiting filter for all endpoints to prevent abuse and brute force attacks.
    RateLimitingFilter.RateLimitRule
     
    RateLimitService
    Shared rate limiting service that keeps counters in Redis when available, with an in-memory fallback for local development/tests.
    SecurityEventLogger
    Centralized security event logging for audit trails.
    SecurityEventLogger.SecurityEvent
     
    SecurityHeadersFilter
    Security headers filter that adds comprehensive security headers to all HTTP responses.
    TenantContext
    Thread-local tenant context for multi-tenant operations.
    TenantContext.TenantContextCallback<T>
    Functional interface for tenant context callbacks
    TenantContext.TenantInfo
    Tenant information holder
    TenantContextFilter
    Filter to extract and set tenant context from authenticated user.
    TenantGuard
    Helper component exposed to Spring Security SpEL expressions for tenant-aware authorization checks.
    TenantIsolated
    Annotation to mark methods that require tenant isolation enforcement.
    TenantIsolationAspect
    Aspect to enforce tenant isolation across all data access operations.
